results.title: Exobrain offline runbook
results.content: Use native infra scripts, enable MAIN_AGENT_USE_MOCK and WEB_TOOLS_USE_MOCK for offline integration tests.

results.title: Assistant frontend mock mode
results.content: Set ASSISTANT_FRONTEND_MOCK_API=true to run the UI without assistant-backend.

results.title: Exobrain Offline Agent Runbook
results.raw_content: Offline mode keeps the full app runnable in restricted environments. Start native infra, seed assistant DB, run assistant-backend with MAIN_AGENT_USE_MOCK=true and WEB_TOOLS_USE_MOCK=true, then run assistant-frontend and log in with seeded credentials.
